title: Wrecked
description: Everyone on campus has a different version of what happened that night.Haley saw Jenny return from the party, shell-shocked.Richard heard Jordan brag about the cute freshman he hooked up with.When Jenny accuses Jordan of rape, Haley and Richard are pushed to opposite sides of the school’s investigation. Now conflicting versions of the story may make bringing the truth to light nearly impossible—especially when reputations, relationships, and whole futures are riding on the verdict.
author: Maria Padian
